name: Cody's Nightmare
description:
Cody's Nightmare is a pixel art run and gun game heavily focused on boss battles. The game is about a little boy named Cody who is stuck in his nightmare! His only way out is to conquer his fears, for example, bugs, clowns, dark, and other similar things that children are scared of. On his adventure, he will fight various enemies representing those fears. But don't worry, he won’t be alone. He will get help from his friends inspired by his favorite toys, comics, and video games.

Play as Cody in his dream as you try to beat all the strange and unique bosses, unlock new weapons and discover the worlds of Cody's nightmares. Can you beat the game and wake up?
